quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Love is not about possession, it's all about appreciation.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The Secret Of Getting Ahead Is Getting Started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I Don't Know The Key To Success, But The Key To Failure Is Trying To Please Everybody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Good Actions Are A Guard Against The Blows Of Adversity.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: I was the first one in the gym, and the last one to leave.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Be patient; patience is a pillar of faith.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: To the people that have said I'm too small, I'm not fast enough, I don't have what it takes, I'm not strong enough. THANK YOU.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It will be a killer, and a chiller, and a thriller, when I get the gorilla in Manila.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing, it's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The word 'happiness' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Diana Scharf

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The more you practice the art of thankfulness, the more you have to be thankful for.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all the others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the wine for the soul. Go on. Get drunk.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: A leader is someone who steps up when others step back.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The best leaders are those who lead by example, not by force.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Self-love is not selfish; you cannot truly love another until you know how to love yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are very powerful, provided you know how powerful you are.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: Meghan Markle

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Faith does not make things easy, it makes them possible.
quotes.author: Luke 1:37

quotes.quote: When you go through deep waters, I will be with you.
quotes.author: Isaiah 43:2

quotes.quote: With God, all things are possible.
quotes.author: Matthew 19:26

quotes.quote: Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is health.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty, otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Health is not just about what you're eating. It's also about what you're thinking and saying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The mind and body are not separate. What affects one, affects the other.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I threw a boomerang a few years ago. I live in constant fear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Parallel lines have so much in common. It’s a shame they’ll never meet.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
quotes.author: Unknown
